title: Interview with Rosie Hodsdon
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Rosie Hodsdon from the University of Sunderland about her PHD work on pornography. Rosie's research interests include sex work, BDSM and other aspects of gender, sexuality and the laws surrounding pornography content.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew talks to Rosie Hodsdon from the University of Sunderland about her PHD work on pornography. Rosie's research interests include sex work, BDSM and other aspects of gender, sexuality and the laws surrounding pornography content.
